whyThisDestination.title: Overview
whyThisDestination.description:
**University **
- Top-ranked, globally recognized universities  
- Wide major choices
- Flexible entry (direct, transfer) 
**Career**
- 2 years work in US without having a work visa
- US Graduates highly valued by NGOs, embassies, multinationals
**Cities/ states**
- New York, Verginia , DC, Minnesota, Maryland, Tennessee...etc

**Augustana College**

**Tuition & Scholarships**

- **Financial aid options**: Merit-based scholarships and need-based grants available up to **70%**

     20hr per week **>$10,000/** year 

**Career services **: assist students with internships, job placement, and research opportunities

whyThisDestination.title: Overview
whyThisDestination.description:
**University **
- Quality education, globally recognized universities                                 
**Career**
- Can work with Stamp 2 visa . no  need to apply for work visa           
- Can stay in Ireland for 1–2 years to look for employment after graduation   
- Can apply for work permit after securing employment                                                                                            
- After working in Ireland for 5 years, students can apply for Permanent Residency. 
**High Visa Success Rate   ** 

**Cities**: Dublin

opportunitiesWhileStudying.title: Overview
opportunitiesWhileStudying.description:
**Cyprus Aydin University **

**Location:** Kyrenia, Northern Cyprus 

**Tuition fee:** $10,600/Year
- scholarship available 
- part-time job available

documentsRequired: Documents must be authenticated by the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the applicant’s home country
visaRequirements: Appointment Fee = 34,300 birr to be paid upon appointment
Bank statements can be both parents and relatives(With a sponsorship letter)
Other financial documents like Properties, Business licenses, ownership of vehicles, etc
Note: Sponsor letter is required and Only family members can sponsor the student
internationalExamRequirements: If a language proficiency certificate is not available, students must pass the universities' language proficiency test administered after the student arrives in campus.

whyThisDestination.title: Overview
whyThisDestination.description:
**University** 
- Quality education                                           
- Quick admission process (3 to 7 days maximum)
**pathway program **for the final year to UK, Australia, Singapore, Ireland and USA (2 years)
- Parents or any family can easily visit the students when they need                                        
**Career** 
- Internship opportunity Can apply for work permit 
- Visa guaranteed - Visa on arrival

**No interview**

opportunitiesWhileStudying.title: Overview
opportunitiesWhileStudying.description:
**Thames International College**

**Tuition fee**: $7000/Year
- Student services, facilities & technology=$1,760                 
- **Deposit**: Half: $4,380 (To be paid while in Ethiopia upon acceptance) 

**The rest can be paid after arriving in Philippines:**
- $450 - Visa fee 
- $350 - Medical & Insurance  
- $2,900 - $3,200 – Accommodation     
- $2,000 - Utilities and Living Expense 

**Total fees = $14,905/Year  **

documentsRequired: Students must authenticate color copy of their academic documents (Transcript, 12 Matric, 10 Matric (if available))
Two authenticated documents are needed for each: one for the university and one for the embassy, sent by postal mail.

The error is:  HttpHostConnectException: Connect to http://192.168.4.185:80 failed: Connection refused  This error means that ZAP received a request from your Android phone, but when ZAP tried to forward that request to the actual website, it couldn't connect. Crucially, the error shows ZAP is trying to connect to Port 80 (standard HTTP), but it's using the same IP address (192.168.4.185) as your proxy.  This strongly suggests ZAP is trying to proxy the request to itself on the HTTP port, which is why the connection is refused, or the browser is somehow confused about the actual destination.
